cast.name: 阿纳斯塔西娅·玛莉尼娜 Anastasia Marinina
梅根·法伦布克 Megan Fahlenbock
罗伯特·伊佛迪 Robert Ifedi
康斯坦丁·沙布罗夫 Konstantin Shaburov

this_title: Christmas with a Prince: Becoming Royal
introduction: Its Christmas again and Dr Tasha is on her way to meet Prince Alexander in St. Savarre. Though this is a happy time it is also a very stressful as a treaty is being negotiated between St. Savarre and Vandelien.When Tasha arrives, Alex surprises her by asking for her hand in marriage. She accepts and they immediately begin planning the wedding. When Princess Miranda finds out she is not happy. She concocts a plan to put a halt to this fairy-tale. Will Miranda succeed or will Tasha have her happily ever after?
chinese_title: Christmas with a Prince: Becoming Royal
